metadata.Title: CVE-2020-10018 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
WebKitGTK through 2.26.4 and WPE WebKit through 2.26.4 (which are theversions right before 2.28.0) contains a memory corruption issue(use-after-free) that may lead to arbitrary code execution. This issue hasbeen fixed in 2.28.0 with improved memory handling.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-10018` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.28.0-1ubuntu2
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.1 - 2.28.0-1ubuntu2
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-6.0 - 2.28.0-1ubuntu2
gir1.2-webkit-6.0 - 2.28.0-1ubuntu2
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.28.0-1ubuntu2
gir1.2-webkit2-4.1 - 2.28.0-1ubuntu2
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.28.0-1ubuntu2
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.28.0-1ubuntu2
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.1-0 - 2.28.0-1ubuntu2
libjavascriptcoregtk-6.0-1 - 2.28.0-1ubuntu2
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.28.0-1ubuntu2
libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0 - 2.28.0-1ubuntu2
libwebkitgtk-6.0-4 - 2.28.0-1ubuntu2
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.28.0-1ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.28.0-1ubuntu2').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
